title: METAL TOP 1000 PART 601-700
description:
METAL TOP 1000 PART 601-700 

Part 7 

I did my metal top 1000 for 3 reasons : 
1. I enjoy giving a mark, touching, palping, reviewing the past, making comments, making the music live, arguing about something, etc ;
2. I think nobody did it before on torrents; 
3. The most important one. I have (as a metal fan, you too) the habit of listening to music, from track one to the last one. I listen to an album an not a track exclusively. But for my mp3 player, I decided to change my way of listening to music, and to make hard-rock listening more like pop listening, or radio listening : that is the band is constantly changing, which we call zapping listening... Of course, you can tell me that from 60 Gbs of music, I simply can put shuffle on everything and letÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s rock baby...
